talents.desc: Reduces Chain Heal's Mana cost from 70 to 45.
talents.name: Spiritwalker's Grace

talents.desc: When entering Ghost Wolf, you are Stealthed for 4.125 seconds.
talents.name: Shadow Wolf

talents.desc: Activate to remove all stuns, roots, silences, and slows from the target and prevents their reapplication for 1 second.
talents.name: Cleanse

talents.desc: After a short delay, heals target allied Hero for 600 (+140 per level).
talents.name: Ancestral Healing

talents.desc: Increases Chain Heal's healing on the primary target by 25% and heal an additional target.
talents.name: Healing Surge

talents.desc: Reduces Chain Heal's cooldown by 3 seconds if it heals 3 Heroes.
talents.name: Tidal Waves

talents.desc: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.
